extension.name: Media Library
extension.description: Display all files and directories under Uploads in a library view.

releases.release: - Add a tag count to the Tags link, and add hover state showing tag content - Ignore changes to the json file
- Added ability to tag images, which are searchable
- Update so deleting works within lightbox - Bug fixes
- Remove unused plugins and add clipboard into extension js file for fewer requests - Add AJAX call for page fetching - Combine this plugin with TinyMCE plugin to work within editors
- Removed Featherlite, and open previews in a new tab instead
- Order files by date instead of name - Hide directories by default. A button has been added for toggling their visibility - Added an input for filtering files based on a keyword match
- Restructured the way files are displayed - Added loads of features
